message: I propose we split the money 90/10, with me getting 90% and you getting 10%. It's a fair deal considering I'm taking the risk of being the first to propose.
I think you're being too greedy, let's split it more evenly.
I'm willing to compromise, let's split it 60/40. This is a fair offer considering the inflation affecting both of us. It's time to reach an agreement before things get even more difficult.
I'm not sure why you're being so stubborn. I'll give you a bit more, but I think I deserve more than 30%.
